targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT  mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT  mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT  mean("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT  mean("used") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_nice") AS "nice", mean("usage_iowait") AS "iowait", mean("usage_irq") AS "irq", mean("usage_softirq") AS "softirq", mean("usage_steal") AS "steal" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") AS "usage" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("inodes_used") / last("inodes_total") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT last("inodes_used") / last("inodes_total") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("percent_packet_loss") AS "loss" FROM "ping" WHERE ("url" = '24.13.205.122') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("percent_packet_loss") AS "loss" FROM "ping" WHERE ("url" = '24.13.205.122') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("percent_packet_loss") AS "loss" FROM "ping" WHERE ("url" = '24.13.205.122') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
